Recommendation test suite
========================================================

```{r}
require(rjson, quietly=TRUE)
source('../common/getELTYPE.R', encoding='UTF-8')
run <- function(TASK) {
  source('../recom/allRecoms.R', encoding='UTF-8')
  print(result[result$recom_id %in% TASK,])
}
```

# Willkommen
```{r}
TASK <- c(627, 442, 1650, 1651)
json <- fromJSON('[]')
run(TASK)
```

```{r}
json <- fromJSON(file='test_simpson_Ich.json')
json[[1]]$title = "ich"
run(TASK)
```
```{r}
json <- fromJSON(file='test_simpson_Ich.json')
json[[1]]$person.geschlecht = ""
run(TASK)
```

```{r}
json <- fromJSON(file='test_simpson_Ich.json')
json[[1]]$person.geburtsdatum = ""
run(TASK)
```
